name: Wedding Dancing Simulator
description:
It's almost 11pm, everyone else is falling asleep, and the dance floor is all yours. Your family is gathered: don't disappoint them. This is your chance to show off your moves, and you mustn't let them down again like you normally do. So your cousin's getting married and they're only 26 - who cares? You don't have anyone tying you down; there's nothing holding you back. Now get up there, before your aunt asks you another awkward question about your 'plans for the future', and make your family proud!

Controls: Up/Down/Left/Right/Esc

Made with: Godot

Art: Aseprite

Music: Bosca Ceoil/Audacity
